lead_paragraph: As terrorists bomb Seville, worldly Fernando Rey boards the Paris train, promptly dumping a bucket of water on a young woman trying to board. As his fellow passengers look on aghast, Rey proceeds to explain why this young woman is "the worst of all women" because she will never allow him to consumate his passion.
